product_name: REI Snowy Creek Fleece Union Suit - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The heavyweight REI Snowy Creek fleece union suit for little girls will help keep tiny snow fans plenty warm and plenty adorable. Plush, polyester fleece is soft and comfortable, dries quickly and continues to insulate even when damp. Front zipper extends from chin down to foot for easy dressing; full-length zipper guard keeps zipper away from sensitive skin. Hood with elastic trim keeps child's head warm. Sleeve and leg cuffs fold over to protect little hands and feet; nylon/spandex binding around cuffs seals in warmth. Gusseted crotch and 3-panel hood enhance the fit. .
short_description: The heavyweight REI Snowy Creek fleece union suit for little girls will help keep tiny snow fans plenty warm and plenty adorable.
subcategory: Kids' Snowsuits, Rain Suits And Buntings
